Nanochromis dimidiatus :

11 specimens: MNHN 92-120, holotype , Central African Republic . MNHN 92-121, paratypes , Central African Republic . MNHN 1921-440, Central African Republic : Bangui. MNHN 1921-441, Central African Republic : Bangui. MRAC 96- 044-P-0113, Congo (Brazzaville) : Etoumbi, au N-O vers le Gabon ( après le bac).

dataObjects.subject: http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#GeneralDescription
dataObjects.title: Biology
dataObjects.description: Known from larger rivers and lakes (Ref. 72415).

dataObjects.subject: http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#Distribution
dataObjects.description: Africa:  drainages of the upper Chari (Central African Republic, Chad basin) and the Ubangi (middle Congo River basin) (Ref. 45441, 47441), and in the upper Congo River basin near Kisangani (50579). Also reported from the Ntem, Cameroon (Ref. 47441).
dataObjects.references: Daget, J. 1991 Nanochromis. p. 270-273. In J. Daget, J.-P. Gosse, G.G. Teugels and D.F.E. Thys van den Audenaerde (eds.) Check-list of the freshwater fishes of Africa (CLOFFA). ISNB, Brussels; MRAC, Tervuren; and ORSTOM, Paris. Vol. 4. (Ref. 5666)

dataObjects.subject: http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#Morphology
dataObjects.description: Dorsal spines (total): 17; Dorsal soft rays (total): 7; Analsoft rays: 6; Vertebrae: 25

dataObjects.subject: http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#Size
dataObjects.title: Max. size
dataObjects.references: Daget, J. 1991 Nanochromis. p. 270-273. In J. Daget, J.-P. Gosse, G.G. Teugels and D.F.E. Thys van den Audenaerde (eds.) Check-list of the freshwater fishes of Africa (CLOFFA). ISNB, Brussels; MRAC, Tervuren; and ORSTOM, Paris. Vol. 4. (Ref. 5666)

dataObjects.subject: http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#DiagnosticDescription
dataObjects.description: Description: hypurals 3 and 4 fused with the urostyle; hypurals 1 and 2 remain autogenous (Ref. 72415).

dataObjects.subject: http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#Habitat
dataObjects.title: Environment
dataObjects.description: demersal; freshwater; pH range: 6.0 - 7.0; dH range: 5 - 8
